src:
Badak Lampung Tak Gentar Barisan Bintang Arema FC
01 Nov 2019, 01:23 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Reputasi Arema FC sebagai salah satu tim besar di Indonesia tak membuat penggawa Badak Lampung jeri. Laskar Saburai, julukan Badak Lampung, menegaskan tekad mereka meraih kemenangan kala menghadapi Arema, pada laga lanjutan Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019.
"Arema adalah tim besar di Liga 1. Mayoritas peain mereka pun memiliki kualitas di atas rata-rata," kata gelandang Badak Lampung, Akbar Tanjung.
"Namun, ini kandang kami. Kami ingin meraih poin maksimal," sambungnya.
Badak Lampung akan melakoni laga pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019, kontra Arema. Pertandingan ini akan dihelat di Stadion Sumpah Pemuda PKOR, Bandar Lampung, Jumat (01/11).
Dalam lima pertandingan terakhir mereka, Badak Lampung tak meraih kemenangan sekali pun. Bahkan, dalam empat pertandingan terakhir, mereka terus menelan kekalahan.
Saat ini, Badak Lampung berada di peringkat 17, dengan raihan 23 poin dari 25 pertandingan. Sementara, Arema berada di peringkat enam klasemen. Mereka mengoleksi 38 angka dari 24 pertandingan.
text:
Lampung Rhinos Are Undaunted by Arema FC's Star Team
Nov 01 2019, 01:23 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arema FC's reputation as one of the big teams in Indonesia does not make Lampung rhino pengeriwa jeri. Laskar Saburai, the nickname of the Lampung Rhinos, confirmed their determination to win when facing Arema, in the continued match Shopee Liga 1 season 2019.
"Arema is a big team in League 1. The majority of their players also have above-average quality," said Lampung Rhinoceros midfielder, Akbar Tanjung.
"However, this is our enclosure. We want to achieve maximum points," he continued.
Lampung rhino will play 26th Shopee Liga 1 match in 2019, contra Arema. This game will be held at the PKOR Youth Oath Stadium, Bandar Lampung, Friday (01/11).
In their last five matches, Lampung Rhinos have not won even once. In fact, in the last four matches, they continue to defeat.
Currently, Lampung Rhinos are ranked 17th, with 23 points from 25 matches. Meanwhile, Arema is ranked sixth in the standings. They collected 38 points from 24 matches.
